name: obsidian-gtd-no-next-step
description: Obsidian plugin that adds a badge to Getting Things Done (GTD) "project" files with no defined next step.

scripts.setup: export DIR=example-vault/.obsidian/plugins/gtd-no-next-step && mkdir -p $DIR && cp -f main.js $DIR/main.js && cp -f manifest.json $DIR/manifest.json && cp -f styles.css $DIR/styles.css
